question: Got a call from my doctor's office.... I have gestational diabetes and anemia.... uggg. Third pregnancy and first time having any type of issues.  Fixing to go pick up iron pills, diabetic friendly food, and my test meter. The part I'm bummed about....I leave for vacation in 3 days...13 more weeks.... I sure do love my lil one so it's a brand new eating plan and no more sonic slushes every now and then. :-)
title: just need to whine a minute....
